author: Owen S. Good
title: Take care of your Nintendo Switch — Nintendo’s repair shops are closed due to COVID-19
description: Nintendo of America said March 24 that the company had closed down its U.S.-based repair operations in light of the global COVID-19 spread, and that some devices sent in for repair may be stranded there until the repair centers reopen.
content: Photo: Michael McWhertor/Polygon US service centers shut down until further notice, UK players should expect delays Nintendo’s customer support operation has closed its repair service centers, as a preventive precaution to limit the spread of the coronavirus … [+1553 chars]
